text: vanankalilum, pumiyilumullavai yarukkuc contam" enru (napiye!) Nir (avarkalaik) kelum; (avarkal enna patil kuramutiyum? Enave)"ellam allahvukke contam" enru kuruviraka avan tan mitu karunaiyai katamaiyakkik kontan; niccayamaka iruti nalil unkalaiyellam avan onru cerppan; itil evvita cantekamum illai evarkal tamakkut tame nastattai untupannik kontarkalo, avarkal iman kollamattarkal
